author: wn.com
title: Want to vote in this year’s elections or next year’s presidential primaries? Today’s your day
text: They say every vote counts: And today’s the last day to make sure yours does. Those 18 and older intending to vote for the first time in the Nov. 3 general election must be registered to vote by today. Mail-in voter registration forms must be postmarked by midnight Friday and received by a local board [...] The post Want to vote in this year’s elections or next year’s presidential primaries? Today’s your day appeared first on Politics on the Hudson. Click on the headline for the rest of this blog post ... ...
